channel.title: No-Doze Correct Godwars Bosses?
channel.description:
Hey everyone, Im using the Project No-Doze (Shards) Source. I would like to have the correct Godwars NPC's in my client instead of using the Troll's & other random NPC's as it does for General Graardor. Example: http://prntscr.com/1q3m4v
What is a different client I can use which has the correct NPC's and will run with No-Doze? Thanks for any advice & Help!
